original_text: These monsters are some of the greatest animals that I have made. But I who made them can take my sword and go near to them. These monsters are some of the greatest animals that I have made. But I who made them can take my sword and go near to them. These monsters are some of the greatest animals that I have made.
korean_text: 그것은 하나님이 만드신 것 중에 으뜸이라 그것을 지으신 이가 자기의 칼을 가져 오기를 바라노라

sentences.original_text: These monsters are some of the greatest animals
sentences.korean_translation: 이 괴수들은 내가 만든 가장 위대한 동물 중 일부입니다
